General.Name: Alujain Corporation
General.Description: Alujain Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells propylene and polypropylene products in Saudi Arabia. It also offers insecticides, agricultural pesticides, cleaning, and home care products. In addition, it manufactures, distributes, and sells geo-synthetic products; and wholesales and manufactures organic chemicals, basic plastic, and synthetic fiber. Further, the company operates and invests in petrochemical and chemical industries, as well as in basic and transformational, plastic, renewable, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Alujain Holding Corporation and changed its name to Alujain Corporation in May 2022. Alujain Corporation was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Al Abbas Ibn Abd Al Mouttaleb, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 12485
